name: Christmas Wheel Surprise Eggs
description:
A new set of wheels for kids with new surprise eggs! Christmas Wheel Machine with Surprise Eggs is a new game that allows you to collect several santa claus and grinch toys by opening surprise eggs. Each egg has a unique design, ranging from santa claus to strong superhero! It's time to turn the wheel and see what a surprise you'll have!
- New surprise egg designs
- Daily reward
- Progression of the level
What's in the roulette machine with surprise eggs .
